values.description: David Churchill is an award winning architectural + interiors photographer based in London and Brighton. He combines his deep passion for design with a flair for balance and light, to capture clean, simple and striking images, free from distractions. His work demonstrates a detailed understanding of the characteristics of the photographic image and the remit of the client.
values.name: D Churchill LTD

values.description:

values.description:
Based in Haywards Heath, West Sussex we are generalist recruiters covering East and West Sussex but we predominantly work with clients in Haywards Heath, Burgess Hill, Crawley, Worthing, Brighton, Lewes and East Grinstead.
 
We recruit for most disciplines of staff, across a variety of sectors on a temporary, contract or permanent basis. We generally recruit for the following roles:
Office support staff - Administrators, Secretaries, PAs, Customer Service
Technical and Engineering
Marketing, PR and Sales
Accountancy
 
We have built up a solid reputation with businesses and candidates since 2003, by providing a fresh and honest approach to recruitment. In fact 80% of our recruitment is via repeat business, due to the fact that we provide a first class service to our clients. This is confirmed by our testimonials. Please don't just take our word for this – take a look at some of the comments from clients and candidates on our testimonials page.
 
Solutions 2 Recruitment is also part of one of the largest independent networked groups of recruitment providers called TEAM. Some of the best talents in the industry are members of this international network, providing solutions to all your staffing needs. This means we can draw upon these resources to supply you with staff nationally and internationally for those more difficult roles to fill.
values.name: Solutions2Recruitment
The Buckley Jolley Real Estate Team
values.description: The Buckley Jolley Real Estate Team is a group of specialists delivering unparalleled real estate service.  Our focus area is residential real estate in and around Livingston County, MI.  Areas we service include Brighton, Howell, Hartland, Pinckney, South Lyon, Fowlerville, Milford, Whitmore Lake, Fenton and Linden, MI.  We are nationally recognized as leaders in the real estate industry and yet our focus is assisting homeowners right here in Southeast Michigan.

values.name: Imago Hypnotherapy
values.description:
At Brighton based Imago Hypnotherapy, Manjinder uses a mixture of Hypnotherapy, NLP and Counselling skills to help individuals to lift mental blocks and move forward with positive changes. 
Some of the issues that can be addressed include; increasing self esteem, sleeping better, managing stress and transforming unwanted habits such as smoking into positive behaviours.
Ms Manjinder Dhaliwal Dip I.Hyp GQHP NLP is a fully qualified and validated practitioner of the General Hypnotherapy Register and General Hypnotherapy Standards Council. She holds a Diploma in Integrated Hypnotherapy and is a member of the internationally recognised NLP Society.

Rutledge Design is a Melbourne based graphic design studio. Established in 2002 we work for cultural, commercial and government entities from our studio in the bay-side Melbourne suburb of Brighton. We have expertise in branding, identity, publications, books, posters, signage, and packaging.
values.name: Rutledge Design
Sooner Sports, LLC dba HockeyDeals.com
values.description: HockeyDeals.com has three retail pro-shop locations in SE Michigan. Brighton (Kensington Valley Ice House), Novi (Novi Ice Arena) and Chelsea (Arctic Coliseum).  These stores currently offer Bauer, Reebok-CCM and Easton equipment, as well as Gong Show apparel.  Skate sharpening services are offered, as are team orders.

The Chesterford Group own and operate 29 Fish & Chip Shops under our Fish'n'Chick'n brand and 1 Fish Restaurant under our Bankers brand. We are the largest Fish and Chip shop chain in the country. Our stores reange from Gt Yarmouth down to Brighton and we are always looking for new business opportunities within our sector.
values.name: The Chesterford Group

Lakeside Homes Inc
values.description: Lakeside Homes is a 245 unit manufactured housing community in New Brighton MN.  We opened in June of 1963.  It was established by Richard and Beverly Aplikowski as a family business.  Along with renting site for homes, there is also a Sales Center, a Service Division and a Finance Department.  Richard is deceased but Beverly and family members operate the business.  Beverly is also active in several community organizations

values.name: Health & Vitality Individual Training Ltd
values.description:
HAVIT's mission is to provide tailored, enjoyable, affordable personal training and sports massage in Brighton and Hove.

I ensure every personal training session is fun, varied and helps you reach your fitness goals. Through 2 free consultations (initial and a follow up a week later) I create a training and nutritional plan that is based on lifestyle analysis. I also offer continued, motivation, advice and support to get you to where you want to be. I will visit you at home, in a local gym or outside in a local park.

My qualifications are: member of the Register Exercise Professionals, Boxercise Instructor, X-biking Instructor and Advanced Core Stability (YMCA). I teach Boxercise at  Wickwoods and offer individual Boxercise sessions.

I perform deep tissue and sports massage at Revitalise in Hove and also home visits for those of you short of time. There are many benefits to sports massage including better circulation, reduced muscular tension.

Moretti Group was founded in 1988.  We believe customer service is our specialty and therefore we have always stayed abreast of technology in the belief this is one of the  essential services we offer our clients.  Couple customer service with well-trained, professional court reporters, videoconferencing suites, video depositions, record copy service, we are ready to serve all your deposition and videoconferencing needs.

We have conference rooms in Kalamazoo, Grand Rapids, St. Joseph, Battle Creek, Brighton, Ann Arbor and in the greater Metro Detroit area.
values.name: Moretti Group
